caption.p: Effects of traditional remedies on planktonic growth of P. aeruginosa and S. aureus. (A) P. aeruginosa and (B) S. aureus were grown in the presence of LB (UT), sesame oil (SO), or the three plant-based formulations (KPE-SO, CDE-SO, and OTE-SO). Two biological replicates (each with three technical replicates) were performed.
